job_overview:
Position: Pre-Closer
Type: Full-Time, Remote
Experience Required: At least 12 months in a title company or real estate closing environment
Location: Remote - strong English preferred.
About Us:
Join a fast-growing, fully remote title company dedicated to delivering streamlined, tech-forward closing services. We work across multiple states with a strong emphasis on efficiency, customer service, and compliance.

Job Description:
As a Pre-Closer, you will play a key role in preparing real estate transactions for closing. You will be responsible for collecting and reviewing documentation, opening title files, coordinating with clients and lenders, and ensuring all title and escrow requirements are met ahead of closing.

Key Responsibilities:
Open and process new title orders
Collect, review, and organize contract and loan documents
Order payoffs, HOA estoppels, municipal lien searches, and other due diligence
Coordinate with buyers, sellers, lenders, and agents
Review title commitments and identify clearance items
Prepare pre-closing packages and maintain communication throughout the closing process
Ensure files meet compliance and underwriting standards

Qualifications:
Minimum 1 year (12 months) of experience as a pre-closer or equivalent in a title or escrow company
Strong understanding of title commitments and settlement procedures
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Highly organized, tech-savvy, and comfortable in a fast-paced remote environment
Experience with Qualia, Slack.

Tools & Benefits:
100% Remote work
Modern tech stack for efficient workflow
Collaborative and supportive team culture
Opportunity to grow within the company

Apply Now:
Send your resume and a brief cover letter. Only qualified candidates will be contacted
